A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who forces them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0118615/","name":"Anaconda","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDc4ODcyNWMtMzI2Zi00YzcwLWE4ZTUtYWM3OWI1MTgwYTc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc5MjA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Horror"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000685/","name":"Jon Voight","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000182/","name":"Jennifer Lopez","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000655/","name":"Eric Stoltz"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0515891/","name":"Luis Llosa"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010507/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026438/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0061829/","name":"Hans Bauer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0143596/","name":"Jim Cash","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0258390/","name":"Jack Epps Jr."],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Anaconda","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2713059609","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWMyYzQ3MDQtZjM3NS00ODUyLTkwMjUtM2JlNjg4ZTZlOTM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWMyYzQ3MDQtZjM3NS00ODUyLTkwMjUtM2JlNjg4ZTZlOTM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer","datePublished":"1997-04-11","description":"A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who forces them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.","keywords":"anaconda,butt,snake,jungle,eaten by animal","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118615/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"likeitorloatheit","dateCreated":"2001-04-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Little consistency","reviewBody":"This is not as bad as some people say it is. Generally, it's pretty formulaic, but there are a few alterations on the monster movie format.

A crew making a documentary set sail down a tropical river, on their way losing their fuel and, you guessed it, bumping into a big snake. There are all the usual characters here: beautiful girl, villain, posh English bloke (there's always one!), working-class hero, etc. They gradually get picked off one-by-one - although guessing the next "victim" is so easy, it takes the fun out of it all.

There are a few oddities in the consistency of the plot. Most of the killing happen in the second half of the film with the first half devoted to boring sub-plots. Curiously, the customary "introduction shock" is not a snake death, but a suicide. We never really find out why this has happened - after all, there is still a lot of Jennifer Lopez to be shown - and this, I think, is one of the main problems with the film. Story lines are attempted but never completed and so the audience will never gain true satisfaction from the film.

Another interesting factor is Terri's boyfriend and his contribution to the story line. During a dive, he gets bitten and the crew manage to recover him. They save his life but he is still unconscious and remains so throughout most of the movie.

However, the weakest character of all is the snake. Sure, it's pretty ugly, but it will never be truly terrifying as the director doesn't play on our sense of fear. We may be surprised when the snake attacks but never truly shocked.

As I said before, this isn't too bad a movie (I've seen worse) - there are some moments of tension, the actors do their jobs and the special effects are far from laughable. You might want to watch this if it's shown of TV, but I wouldn't pay money to see it.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98695,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8,"duration":"PT1H29M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Directed by D.J. Caruso. With Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan, Rosario Dawson, Michael Chiklis. Jerry and Rachel are two strangers thrown together by a mysterious phone call from a woman they have never met. Threatening their lives and family, she pushes Jerry and Rachel into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, using the technology of everyday life to track and control their every move.

Two hardened criminals get into trouble with the US border patrol after meeting with a Mexican drug lord, and then revelations start to unfold." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1272878/","name":"2 Guns","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTQ5MTgzNDg4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjAyODEzOQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000242/","name":"Mark Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1745736/","name":"Paula Patton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0466349/","name":"Baltasar Kormákur"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017712/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093810/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1398578/","name":"Blake Masters"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1556427/","name":"Steven Grant"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1587915033","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE3MDYwODIxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMyNTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE3MDYwODIxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMyNTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A DEA agent and an undercover Naval Intelligence officer who have been tasked with investigating one another find they have been set up by the mob -- the very organization the two men believe they have been stealing money from. "},"datePublished":"2013-10-09","description":"Two hardened criminals get into trouble with the US border patrol after meeting with a Mexican drug lord, and then revelations start to unfold.","keywords":"female nudity,border,bank,close up of breasts,police officer","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1272878/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"GManFromHeck"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not a masterpiece or work of fine art. It's not meant to be. It's meant to be entertaining and that's exactly what it is.","reviewBody":"When the credits started, I had a big smile on my face.

What is your perception of 2 Guns? Whether you've seen the trailer or read the comic, you might have an idea what sort of movie this is. If so, you will be correct and happy you decided to watch it.

The big surprise many seem to have is the fact that this movie is based on the 2 GUNS comic Boom! Studios put out in 2007. I'll admit, despite the fact that I've always read a lot of Boom's comics, this series somehow completely snuck by. I did read the series before watching the movie. Whether or not you should do that, we'll get to that in minute.

The movie stars Denzel Washington and Mark Wahlberg. That in itself is pretty impressive. These two actors crank up the charisma during the movie. You can't help but enjoy their presence on screen.

These two guys are planning on robbing a bank. It turns out it wasn't a simple bank and they ended up with way more than they thought. The twists and turns avalanche upon them as they discover others that are interested in the money plus the fact that they don't know each other as well as they thought. If you've watched the trailer, you probably know more about the movie than you should.

Washington and Wahlberg are great together. For a movie with a lot of shooting and one- liners, it's the kind you can just become immersed in. This is pure entertainment. Parts may get a little outrageous and a tad predictable. But there are still plenty of twists to catch you off guard. You'll laugh, you'll be on the edge of your seat and you'll even find yourself flinching or cringing a little at times.

Should you or should you not read the comic first?

That really depends on how much you want to know ahead of time. Some of the twists weren't revealed in the trailers. The movie is pretty faithful to the comic, something pretty rare for a "comic book movie." There are obviously some minor differences but if you have read it before, you'll smile hearing some lines taken directly from the comic. Washington's casting is a bit of a departure. I felt as if his character and Wahlberg's were closer in age in the comic. But seeing the two together, it absolutely does not matter. These two made the movie fun.

You're probably aware this isn't a piece of fine art. It's not meant to be. Usually at this point in the summer, all the "big" Hollywood movies have been released. This is a movie that gives you a reason to go back to the theaters one more time.

It's more than just about Washington and Wahlberg. Those two could have easily carried the burden of being the box office draw. We are also treated to great performances by Bill Paxton, Edward James Olmos, James Marsden and Paula Patton. That's what makes the movie even more of a pleasant surprise. You get a sense that some thought and care was put into the making of this movie. Not only is it faithful to the comic, the filmmakers also made sure it had a great cast and delivered a really good quality production.

The movie is rated R. Clearly there is quite a bit of violence. There's plenty of shooting, killing and explosions. It gets a little over the top but that's what you should expect from this kind of movie. There is also some brief nudity and plenty of profanity. In other words, this isn't a family film. What it is is a movie you go see with your friends. Buy some popcorn, lean back in your seat and just enjoy the movie and have a great time.

I mentioned leaving the theater with a smile. It's not a "feel good" movie. But it will make you laugh and give you a good time. That's exactly what I want for my money. It's fun and absurd with over the top action. Do I want a sequel? Boom! Studios did release 3 GUNS this week. I would indeed love to see these two return to the characters.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":200836,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

The movie is rated R. Clearly there is quite a bit of violence. There's plenty of shooting, killing and explosions. It gets a little over the top but that's what you should expect from this kind of movie. There is also some brief nudity and plenty of profanity. In other words, this isn't a family film. What it is is a movie you go see with your friends. Buy some popcorn, lean back in your seat and just enjoy the movie and have a great time.

I mentioned leaving the theater with a smile. It's not a "feel good" movie. But it will make you laugh and give you a good time. That's exactly what I want for my money. It's fun and absurd with over the top action. Do I want a sequel? Boom! Studios did release 3 GUNS this week. I would indeed love to see these two return to the characters.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":200836,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"duration":"PT1H49M"</script><metacontent="

Darius Stone, a new agent in the xXx program, is sent to Washington, D.C. to stop a coup attempt against the President of the United States." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0329774/","name":"xXx: State of the Union","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY4ZGQ2OGItNGQ4NC00MWVmLTgxMzktYThjNmRlNjYzYjQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001084/","name":"Ice Cube"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. Jackson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000353/","name":"Willem Dafoe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0848414/","name":"Lee Tamahori"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929186/","name":"Rich Wilkes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334526/","name":"Simon Kinberg"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"xXx: State of the Union","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2080309529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDgyZjMxZmYtZGNhOS00ODI4LThhODEtMzBjYzI2ZjQwZmJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDgyZjMxZmYtZGNhOS00ODI4LThhODEtMzBjYzI2ZjQwZmJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Sony Pictures"},"datePublished":"2005-04-27","description":"Darius Stone, a new agent in the xXx program, is sent to Washington, D.C. to stop a coup attempt against the President of the United States.","keywords":"man wears eyeglasses,slow motion scene,spy,stabbing,reference to johnnie cochran","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0329774/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kriticalreview"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"cookie cutter plot","reviewBody":"Saw a screening of it today,...and probably wished I didn't agree to watch it,.. Anyways, I don't even know where to begin so here goes: Plot/action: The usual cliché plot line that involves government agency coverups, bad blood, and conspiracies to kill the President. I thought the first 'XXX' was OK, but the plot of 'XXX2' is so unoriginal and narrow-minded it makes the first one seem like an epic. The action and stunts aren't even imaginative,.. seems like even money can't buy a good movie because even the fight scenes are uninspiring,..kind of reminds me of Steven Seagal movies where you're even hoping that the main character gets his ass kicked Characters: Ice Cube playing his usual badass self, although the release of this movie is in such close proximity to 'are we there yet?' that it almost seems like him and Vin Diesel (The Pacifier) have teamed up secretly to harm America with such bad movies. Overall, I think that Ice Cube's character lacks the edge of Vin Diesel in the first installment. The other characters in this movie including the main badguy (Willem Dafoe) are cardboard thin leading you to wonder as the movie goes along if the plot development will be just as bad.\n\nOverall Entertainment Value: 4/10,..I feel that the movie would have been better if they eased up on the whole government agency conspiracy aspect and focused more on stunts, which made the first one much more easy to watch","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":68121,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

However, every store is sold out of them, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.","keywords":"christmas,christmas movie,action figure,postman,santa claus character","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116705/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rebeljenn"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Despite its problems, I thought it was funny","reviewBody":"'Jingle All The Way' is a Christmas story about merchandising and family. A lot of people seemed to really hate this movie, but I did not think it was all that bad. Sure, some of the action and the story was not the best, but I thought it did provoke a lot of laughter. The scenes with Arnie at the warehouse filled with Santas and elves was funny, and it had a good ending with the father becoming the hero after all. It does represent the bad of the holiday season with all the merchandising and the over-emphasis on that one particular toy that kids must get for Christmas, and if they do not receive it, then they are outcasts. Despite its problems, I did find it a funny and worthwhile film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":95035,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

A lot of people seemed to really hate this movie, but I did not think it was all that bad. Sure, some of the action and the story was not the best, but I thought it did provoke a lot of laughter. However, every store is sold out of them, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.","keywords":"christmas,christmas movie,action figure,postman,santa claus character","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116705/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"rebeljenn","dateCreated":"2005-12-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Despite its problems, I thought it was funny","reviewBody":"'Jingle All The Way' is a Christmas story about merchandising and family. A lot of people seemed to really hate this movie, but I did not think it was all that bad. Sure, some of the action and the story was not the best, but I thought it did provoke a lot of laughter. The scenes with Arnie at the warehouse filled with Santas and elves was funny, and it had a good ending with the father becoming the hero after all. It does represent the bad of the holiday season with all the merchandising and the over-emphasis on that one particular toy that kids must get for Christmas, and if they do not receive it, then they are outcasts. Darius Stone, a new agent in the xXx program, is sent to Washington, D.C. to stop a coup attempt against the President of the United States." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0329774/","name":"xXx: State of the Union","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY4ZGQ2OGItNGQ4NC00MWVmLTgxMzktYThjNmRlNjYzYjQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001084/","name":"Ice Cube"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. Jackson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000353/","name":"Willem Dafoe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0848414/","name":"Lee Tamahori"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929186/","name":"Rich Wilkes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334526/","name":"Simon Kinberg"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"xXx: State of the Union","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2080309529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDgyZjMxZmYtZGNhOS00ODI4LThhODEtMzBjYzI2ZjQwZmJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDgyZjMxZmYtZGNhOS00ODI4LThhODEtMzBjYzI2ZjQwZmJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Sony Pictures"},"datePublished":"2005-04-27","description":"Darius Stone, a new agent in the xXx program, is sent to Washington, D.C. to stop a coup attempt against the President of the United States.","keywords":"man wears eyeglasses,slow motion scene,spy,stabbing,reference to johnnie cochran","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0329774/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kriticalreview"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"cookie cutter plot","reviewBody":"Saw a screening of it today,...and probably wished I didn't agree to watch it,.. Anyways, I don't even know where to begin so here goes: Plot/action: The usual cliché plot line that involves government agency coverups, bad blood, and conspiracies to kill the President. I thought the first 'XXX' was OK, but the plot of 'XXX2' is so unoriginal and narrow-minded it makes the first one seem like an epic. The action and stunts aren't even imaginative,.. seems like even money can't buy a good movie because even the fight scenes are uninspiring,..kind of reminds me of Steven Seagal movies where you're even hoping that the main character gets his ass kicked Characters: Ice Cube playing his usual badass self, although the release of this movie is in such close proximity to 'are we there yet?' that it almost seems like him and Vin Diesel (The Pacifier) have teamed up secretly to harm America with such bad movies. Overall, I think that Ice Cube's character lacks the edge of Vin Diesel in the first installment. The other characters in this movie including the main badguy (Willem Dafoe) are cardboard thin leading you to wonder as the movie goes along if the plot development will be just as bad.\n\nOverall Entertainment Value: 4/10,..I feel that the movie would have been better if they eased up on the whole government agency conspiracy aspect and focused more on stunts, which made the first one much more easy to watch","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":68121,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

Deeply ensconced in a top-secret military program, three pilots struggle to bring an artificial intelligence program under control before it initiates the next world war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0382992/","name":"Stealth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzMzNTY0NTYwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTExNjgyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524197/","name":"Josh Lucas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004754/","name":"Jessica Biel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004937/","name":"Jamie Foxx"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003418/","name":"Rob Cohen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029574/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0725379/","name":"W.D. Richter"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stealth","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi596312345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWQxYzBkNzAtYWE2YS00MjViLWJlNzEtNjEyMjZhNDI4MzFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWQxYzBkNzAtYWE2YS00MjViLWJlNzEtNjEyMjZhNDI4MzFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures"},"datePublished":"2005-09-14","description":"Deeply ensconced in a top-secret military program, three pilots struggle to bring an artificial intelligence program under control before it initiates the next world war.","keywords":"aircraft cockpit,missile attack,captain,lieutenant,vertical take off and landing aircraft","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0382992/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2007-10-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Spectacular aircrafts movie with lots of CG effects and noisy action","reviewBody":"The picture concerns about two all-American boys(Josh Lucas, Jamie Foxx) and a brave girl(Jessica Biel).They are the best US Navy pilots and were chosen by Captain Cummins(Sam Shepard) to fly the latest marvel aircraft, Stealth fighter, called Talons, a supersonic fighting planes. They go behind world terrorists into Rangun and Kirghistan. Captain Cummins adds a new member to the team, an unmanned combat aerial vehicle that is being flown by a computer called Edi( voice of Wentworth Miller) with an artificial intelligence brain inside the cockpit and operated by a technician(Richard Roxburgh). But the exceptional Stealth is struck by a lightning and like HAL from ¨2001, Space Odyssey", starts to think for itself, rebelling against the humans. The trio ought to stop it , before begins WWIII.\n\nThis is a well produced and entertaining film though some moments is lamentably dull, for that reason is instantly forgettable trifle. The story of three valiant Lieutenants is much too-thin to sustain such a long movie. What's important here are the combats, shootings, airplane pursuits, flying sequences , among the best in the last time Hollywood history. Amazing computer generator FX are realized by Digital Domain, whose owner is James Cameron. Fantastic, memorable aerial cinematography by Deam Semler is the main asset of this silly story with stunning dogfighting and horrible disco-music by BT. Numerous films appear ¨Stealth¨, the next generation aircraft, as the production star, the first movie was ¨Firefox¨(Clint Eastwood)and two with Steven Seagal(Executive decision and Flight of fury) and several in B series, especially. The motion picture is lavishly produced by Neal Moritz and professionally directed by Rob Cohen, both are usual action movies experts. Rating : Acceptable and passable for its spectacular images.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":52398,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

Captain Cummins adds a new member to the team, an unmanned combat aerial vehicle that is being flown by a computer called Edi( voice of Wentworth Miller) with an artificial intelligence brain inside the cockpit and operated by a technician(Richard Roxburgh). But the exceptional Stealth is struck by a lightning and like HAL from ¨2001, Space Odyssey", starts to think for itself, rebelling against the humans. The trio ought to stop it , before begins WWIII.\n\nThis is a well produced and entertaining film though some moments is lamentably dull, for that reason is instantly forgettable trifle. The story of three valiant Lieutenants is much too-thin to sustain such a long movie. What's important here are the combats, shootings, airplane pursuits, flying sequences , among the best in the last time Hollywood history. Amazing computer generator FX are realized by Digital Domain, whose owner is James Cameron. Fantastic, memorable aerial cinematography by Deam Semler is the main asset of this silly story with stunning dogfighting and horrible disco-music by BT. Numerous films appear ¨Stealth¨, the next generation aircraft, as the production star, the first movie was ¨Firefox¨(Clint Eastwood)and two with Steven Seagal(Executive decision and Flight of fury) and several in B series, especially. The motion picture is lavishly produced by Neal Moritz and professionally directed by Rob Cohen, both are usual action movies experts. Rating : Acceptable and passable for its spectacular images.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":52398,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1,"duration":"PT2H1M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hart's War
Hartov rat
programme.desc:
Hart's War: Directed by Gregory Hoblit. With Bruce Willis, Colin Farrell, Terrence Howard, Cole Hauser. A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0251114/","name":"Hart's War","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzMDg5ODQ1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjc2Nzc5._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","War"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268199/","name":"Colin Farrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005024/","name":"Terrence Howard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0387706/","name":"Gregory Hoblit"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041195/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051510/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009743/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0441896/","name":"John Katzenbach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0712753/","name":"Billy Ray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0313623/","name":"Terry George"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What Roles Has Colin Farrell Been Considered For?","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3290545689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmM4MTY3MjItMzQyYy00NWY4LTk5MGMtYTc4ZjYwMTZmZDIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmM4MTY3MjItMzQyYy00NWY4LTk5MGMtYTc4ZjYwMTZmZDIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"From Alexander the Great to king of cool Sonny Crockett, Colin Farrell has played his share of legends over the years. But he's also missed out on a few opportunities, from a boy band star to the Oscar winning 'Brokeback Mountain.'"},"datePublished":"2002-06-19","description":"A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.","keywords":"n word,f word,movie flop,battle of the bulge,bulge","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0251114/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"w2amarketing"},"dateCreated":"2003-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not bad","reviewBody":"This film is absorbing because you are kept guessing until the very end. Hart, the lead character, isn't exactly an angel; and the Nazi Kommandant conjures up a measure of sympathy, with other motives of characters such as Col. MacNamara (Willis) truly unclear until the end. 

Thus, it's enough to keep you watching, although I wish I'd read the book first. Also, it's not an "action" film in the Schwarzenegger sense, but it is fast-paced and holds your attention, as the plot keeps twisting and turning. 

Contrary to what others thought, I found HART'S WAR to be reasonably historically accurate. It's frequently pointed out that by late 1944 / early 1945, the Germans were reeling, desperate and disorganized, while HART'S WAR portrays them firmly in control. This is a fair criticism, but I would respond as follows:

1. HART'S WAR coincides with the Ardennes offensive (Battle of the Bulge), which was the last major German offensive of the war and which came perilously close to succeeding. Puffed up from that near-victory, not knowing (as we know today) that this was the last gasp of a dying reich and not a turning point towards victory, and now holding hundreds if not thousands of Allied POW's to boot, it's no surprise that the Germans are still confident of victory.

2. Also, HART'S WAR takes place in a short period of time (I would guess 2-3 weeks between Hart's capture and the end of the trial, which itself is only a week). The story does not drag into the spring of '45, at which point the Germans knew they were losing.

3. The Nazi Kommandant epitomizes this German confidence, yet because he was educated in the US, he has at least a measure of sympathy for his American prisoners and treats them with an equal measure of military courtesy, with a few exceptions. Other Kommandants during this time may not have been as "humane," but, because of his background, Visser's lack of brutality (again, with exceptions) is understandable.

Bruce Willis is clearly a supporting actor in this film, but I felt he had a strong and important role and was, arguably, the CENTRAL character while Colin Farrell is the LEADING character. However, Willis gets top billing for one simple reason -- TO SELL TICKETS. It worked for me, at least."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51311,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword: Directed by Guy Ritchie. With Charlie Hunnam, Astrid Bergès-Frisbey, Jude Law, Djimon Hounsou. Robbed of his birthright, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1972591/","name":"King Arthur: Legend of the Sword","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM3ODY3Njc5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQ5NjM5MTI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0402271/","name":"Charlie Hunnam"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2793591/","name":"Astrid Bergès-Frisbey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108864/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093488/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1703612/","name":"Joby Harold"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0927880/","name":"Lionel Wigram"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi458012185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NjY1MjM3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTc2MjExMzI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NjY1MjM3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTc2MjExMzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Robbed of his birthright, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not."},"datePublished":"2017-05-12","description":"Robbed of his birthright, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not.","keywords":"folklore,excalibur,tyrant,knights of the round table,historical fiction","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1972591/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MR_Heraclius"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"King Arthur","reviewBody":"Let's be clear: this contains very few aspects of the actual Arthur legend. They probably should have just gone for a wacky original medieval fantasy film instead. That being said, I didn't expect Ritchie's style to work this well here. And he hasn't been this crazy since Snatch. Some montages are so breathless, fast and innovative as far as editing and soundtrack go, it's a pleasure. Sure, the plot follows the genre conventions more or less, and the finale is a bit heavy on CGI. On the other hand the assassination attempt sequence is fantastic and the portrayal of magic pretty cool. Hell, I had fun with this.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":198597,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"duration":"PT2H6M"}</script><metacontent="

"},"datePublished":"2014-03-06","description":"A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.","keywords":"hotel,lobby boy,prison escape,first person narration,painting","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2278388/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MartinHafer"},"dateCreated":"2014-06-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Strange and pretty much impossible to describe.","reviewBody":"Wes Anderson's films are really hard to describe or define. Suffice to say that he is unique in his style--very unique. This uniqueness is what makes "The Grand Budapest Hotel" worth seeing. It's an odd story where a story is told within a story--and it's filled with famous actors making lots of odd cameos. And, like Anderson's other films, it's full of odd characters, unusual dialog and brisk-paced editing. And, not surprisingly, it's NOTHING like other films by other directors.

The bottom line is that all these weird factors work together to make a film that you'll probably enjoy--but, like me, you won't be exactly sure why!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":730793,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hotel Grand Budapest
programme.desc: Smješten u okvire svijeta koji se dramatično mijenja između dva rata, film prepričava pustolovine Gustavea, legendarnoga konsijerža slavnog europskog hotela i Zeroa, hotelskoga potrčka. HOTEL GRAND BUDAPEST prepričava pustolovine Gustavea H., legendarnog konsijerža slavnog europskog hotela između dva rata, i Zeroa Moustafe, hotelskoga potrčka koji mu postane najvjerniji prijatelj. Priča uključuje krađu i pronalazak neprocjenjive renesansne slike, bitku oko golemog obiteljskog imetka, očajničku jurnjavu na motociklima, vlakovima, sanjkama i skijama te najslađu ljubavnu aferu - sve u okviru naglih i dramatičnih promjena na Starome kontinentu.

credits.actor: Gwyneth Paltrow, Jack Black, Jason Alexander, Anthony Robbins, Joe Viterelli, Susan Ward, Zen Gesner, Bruce McGill

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
Kralj Arthur: Legenda o maču
programme.desc: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword: Directed by Guy Ritchie. With Charlie Hunnam, Astrid Bergès-Frisbey, Jude Law, Djimon Hounsou. Robbed of his birthright, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1972591/","name":"King Arthur: Legend of the Sword","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM3ODY3Njc5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQ5NjM5MTI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0402271/","name":"Charlie Hunnam"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2793591/","name":"Astrid Bergès-Frisbey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108864/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093488/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1703612/","name":"Joby Harold"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0927880/","name":"Lionel Wigram"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi458012185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NjY1MjM3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTc2MjExMzI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NjY1MjM3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTc2MjExMzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Robbed of his birthright, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not."},"datePublished":"2017-05-12","description":"Robbed of his birthright, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not.","keywords":"folklore,excalibur,tyrant,knights of the round table,historical fiction","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1972591/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MR_Heraclius"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"King Arthur","reviewBody":"Let's be clear: this contains very few aspects of the actual Arthur legend. They probably should have just gone for a wacky original medieval fantasy film instead. That being said, I didn't expect Ritchie's style to work this well here. And he hasn't been this crazy since Snatch. Some montages are so breathless, fast and innovative as far as editing and soundtrack go, it's a pleasure. Sure, the plot follows the genre conventions more or less, and the finale is a bit heavy on CGI. On the other hand the assassination attempt sequence is fantastic and the portrayal of magic pretty cool. Hell, I had fun with this.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":198597,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"duration":"PT2H6M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bosko Buha
Boško Buha
programme.desc: Directed by Branko Bauer. With Marko Nikolic, Zarko Radic, Ljubisa Samardzic, Miroljub Leso. The movie is based on the true story about a group of children, barely teenagers, who joined Yugoslav Partizans after losing their families in WW2. At first, Partizans want to get rid of them, but later they are joining combat ranks. Among them, Bosko Buha would become a legend because of his skill in destroying enemy bunkers.

credits.actor: Ivan Kujundžić, Dragan Bjelogrlić, Marko Nikolić, Žarko Radić, Ljubisa Samardzic, Milan Štrljić, Miroljub Leso, Dušan Antonijević

programme.title: Pas koji je voleo vozove
Pas koji je voleo vozove
programme.desc: Pas koji je voleo vozove: Directed by Goran Paskaljevic. With Svetlana Bojkovic, Irfan Mensur, Velimir 'Bata' Zivojinovic, Pavle Vuisic. A fugitive girl, a stuntman and a young man who lost his dog quite some time before, are joining together on a trip to reach each of their own destination. A youngster gets emotionally connected to the girl, and he'd try to help her to leave the bossy stuntman, to get false passport and escape to Paris." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0124825/","name":"Pas koji je voleo vozove","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWViYWQ3OTctZWRhNS00ZmRkLWIzZDgtNjM5MWRhMjVjNDM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzI3NzE5MDk@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092522/","name":"Svetlana Bojkovic"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0579840/","name":"Irfan Mensur"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0957372/","name":"Velimir 'Bata' Zivojinovic"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0664607/","name":"Goran Paskaljevic"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049004/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076194/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586235/","name":"Gordan Mihic"}],"datePublished":"1977-12-12","description":"A fugitive girl, a stuntman and a young man who lost his dog quite some time before, are joining together on a trip to reach each of their own destination. A youngster gets emotionally connected to the girl, and he'd try to help her ","keywords":"false passport,dog,prison escape,fate,on the road","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0124825/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fabiohenrique"},"dateCreated":"2010-04-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very nice and rare Yugo movie","reviewBody":"I discovered this nice little movie surfing at the net , and after reading some lines about it I got curious around it : a touching and surprisingly Yugoslavian movie about three lost souls living under hard conditions . programme.desc: Razvod na odredjeno vreme: Directed by Milan Jelic. With Ljubisa Samardzic, Milena Dravic, Velimir 'Bata' Zivojinovic, Jelisaveta 'Seka' Sablic. programme.title: Davitelj protiv davitelja
Davitelj protiv davitelja
programme.desc: Directed by Slobodan Sijan. With Tasko Nacic, Nikola Simic, Srdjan Saper, Sonja Savic. A mentally disturbed flower seller starts killing young girls on the streets of Belgrade. While the frustrated police inspector is trying to stop him, an aspiring musician finds his life and work deeply intertwined with that of a killer.

programme.title: Bosko Buha
Boško Buha
programme.desc: Directed by Branko Bauer. With Marko Nikolic, Zarko Radic, Ljubisa Samardzic, Miroljub Leso. The movie is based on the true story about a group of children, barely teenagers, who joined Yugoslav Partizans after losing their families in WW2. At first, Partizans want to get rid of them, but later they are joining combat ranks. Among them, Bosko Buha would become a legend because of his skill in destroying enemy bunkers.

Davitelj protiv davitelja
programme.desc: Directed by Slobodan Sijan. With Tasko Nacic, Nikola Simic, Srdjan Saper, Sonja Savic. A mentally disturbed flower seller starts killing young girls on the streets of Belgrade. While the frustrated police inspector is trying to stop him, an aspiring musician finds his life and work deeply intertwined with that of a killer.

programme.title: Pejzaži u magli
programme.desc: Život i sudbina grupe mladih narkomana iz Beograda kojoj se pridruži maloletna učenica. Posle sukoba sa roditeljima i incidenta u školi, ona raskida ljubavnu vezu sa svojim mladićem... Život i sudbina grupe mladih narkomana iz Beograda kojoj se pridruži maloletna učenica. Posle sukoba sa roditeljima i incidenta u školi, ona raskida ljubavnu vezu sa svojim mladićem i počinje da živi sa narkomanom i prodavcem droge. Sa njim i ostalim narkomanima doživljava niz dramatičnih situacija, čak dospeva i u zatvor. Pokušava da se oslobodi droge, ali ne uspeva. Posle zatvora odbija da se vrati roditeljima i sa svojom prijateljicom, bivšom narkomankom, dogovori se da odu iz Beograda. Na žalost, umesto da otputuje, njen leš pronalaze deratizatori u jednom podrumu.

programme.title: Patuljci sa naslovnih strana
Patuljci sa naslovnih strana
programme.desc: Directed by Milorad Milinkovic. With Gordan Kicic, Jelena Djukic, Milena Radulovic, Boris Milivojevic. For 40 year old Nikola, everyday life is just about producing the worst, the most vulgar reality shows and hidden cameras for TV. His life begins to change when he starts to mentor young girl pushed to be star by her ambitious mother. In turn of the events, Nikola starts to wonder if it is he who is the target of some hidden camera show.

Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into a seductive game." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0430912/","name":"Basic Instinct 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzNzM3ODY3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzMyNDcyNA@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000232/","name":"Sharon Stone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0607375/","name":"David Morrissey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000667/","name":"David Thewlis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001994/","name":"Michael Caton-Jones"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066021/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000390/","name":"Joe Eszterhas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0054713/","name":"Leora Barish"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0063785/","name":"Henry Bean"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Basic Instinct 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi985202969","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTJmMTA5ZmUtOTRjMy00OGM2LTllNjEtNmI0YWJjMTE1YmQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTJmMTA5ZmUtOTRjMy00OGM2LTllNjEtNmI0YWJjMTE1YmQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"datePublished":"2007-01-10","description":"Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into ","keywords":"narcissistic personality disorder,antisocial personality disorder,sex,consensual sex,female female kiss","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0430912/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"screenwriter-14"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sharon Stone "Chills and Sizzles" through Basic Instinct 2","reviewBody":"I read all the previous reviews and nasty online comments in regard to La Stone returning as the evil Catherine Davis Tramell in Basic Instinct 2 now set in London and I want to say, "go see the film because Sharon Stone is still a chilling, evil, a tad older, but still glamorous vixen" in Basic Instinct 2 and commands the film from the first frame to the last. Sure, Stone throws in a few "camp moments", but who cares, as she is Catherine Davis Tramell, weaving a story of intrigue and doom for whoever falls into her hands.

London is a perfect location for the grown up Catherine, and the city reflects the new sophisticated evilness which she is weaving into another book of her deadly sins. The British cast, Charlotte Rampling and the handsome David Morrisey especially, provide the perfect moments in the film to send Stone/Tramell into her evil ways. The sets are so dark, reminded me of ASYLUM, and Stone perfectly matches the glamor of London.

BASIC INSTINCT 2 will never be the first BASIC INSTINCT, and it shouldn't, as Catherine Tramell has moved on from Nick and pretty little San Francisco to something bigger-London, and with the ending, also reminded me of ASYLUM, you wonder if our Catherine is onto new and more deadly games. Hope so...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37901,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.3},"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into ","keywords":"narcissistic personality disorder,antisocial personality disorder,sex,consensual sex,female female kiss","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0430912/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"screenwriter-14"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sharon Stone "Chills and Sizzles" through Basic Instinct 2","reviewBody":"I read all the previous reviews and nasty online comments in regard to La Stone returning as the evil Catherine Davis Tramell in Basic Instinct 2 now set in London and I want to say, "go see the film because Sharon Stone is still a chilling, evil, a tad older, but still glamorous vixen" in Basic Instinct 2 and commands the film from the first frame to the last. Sure, Stone throws in a few "camp moments", but who cares, as she is Catherine Davis Tramell, weaving a story of intrigue and doom for whoever falls into her hands.

London is a perfect location for the grown up Catherine, and the city reflects the new sophisticated evilness which she is weaving into another book of her deadly sins. The British cast, Charlotte Rampling and the handsome David Morrisey especially, provide the perfect moments in the film to send Stone/Tramell into her evil ways. The sets are so dark, reminded me of ASYLUM, and Stone perfectly matches the glamor of London.

BASIC INSTINCT 2 will never be the first BASIC INSTINCT, and it shouldn't, as Catherine Tramell has moved on from Nick and pretty little San Francisco to something bigger-London, and with the ending, also reminded me of ASYLUM, you wonder if our Catherine is onto new and more deadly games. Hope so...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37901,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.3},"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

no, but a good one, after which I didn't feel as if I wasted my time. This movie reminds me a lot of a compressed season of "24", with Dominic Cooper's character analogous to Jack Bauer. Action was good, a couple of plot twists, casting was actually very good.

Bad guy was very good - not an over-the-top characterization, but something more believable.

The movie did play like a made-for-TV show, but not in a bad way. Less budget and special effects than a theatrical release, but still quite good. I'd watch it again.

If you like "24", you'll like this.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4714,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

no, but a good one, after which I didn't feel as if I wasted my time. This movie reminds me a lot of a compressed season of "24", with Dominic Cooper's character analogous to Jack Bauer. Action was good, a couple of plot twists, casting was actually very good.

Bad guy was very good - not an over-the-top characterization, but something more believable.

The movie did play like a made-for-TV show, but not in a bad way. Less budget and special effects than a theatrical release, but still quite good. I'd watch it again.

If you like "24", you'll like this.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4714,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8,"duration":"PT1H34M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Straton
programme.desc: Straton, MI6 specijalni operativac i njegov američki kolega Marti, odlaze u laboratorijski kompleks u Iranu kako bi pronašli ukradeno smrtonosno biohemijsko oružje. Njihova nikad zahtevnija misija... Straton, MI6 specijalni operativac i njegov američki kolega Marti, odlaze u laboratorijski kompleks u Iranu kako bi pronašli ukradeno smrtonosno biohemijsko oružje. Njihova nikad zahtevnija misija kreće spektakularno po zlu i Marti biva smrtno ranjen. Straton se vraća u sedište MI6-a i saznaje da je bivši sovjetski operativac Berovski, smatran mrtvim već 20 godina, ipak živ i sprema osvetu svojim bivšim nalogodavcima služeći se ukradenim hemijskim oružjem. U trci protiv vremena koja sledi, Straton i njegov tim moraće upotrebiti svu snagu i iskustvo koje imaju ne bi li sprečili nadolazeću katastrofu.

grenade","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120179/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shakercoola"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Episodic sequel lacking the original's thematic strength","reviewBody":"An American action adventure thriller and sequel to the 1994 hit "Speed". Sadly, this follow up set on a slow moving cruise ship lacked the impetus of the original's theme-as-action. It has some very impressive stunts and it never fails to look busy, but the story is crammed with too many action events and has a drab script. The dialogue is cliched, the characterization as thin as gruel, the plot devices overfamiliar, and the action sequences fail to generate any excitement. Jason Patric fails to fully impose himself as the lead and Sandra Bullock is disappointingly sidelined into producing a frenetic character and she ends up overworking her character. Willem Dafoe looks the part but acts tough rather than playing tough. All in all, it's action packed but froths over. The finale does justify sticking with it because back in 1997 it was most expensive stunt ever filmed.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76249,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.9},"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

grenade","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120179/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"shakercoola","dateCreated":"2019-03-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Episodic sequel lacking the original's thematic strength","reviewBody":"An American action adventure thriller and sequel to the 1994 hit "Speed". Sadly, this follow up set on a slow moving cruise ship lacked the impetus of the original's theme-as-action. It has some very impressive stunts and it never fails to look busy, but the story is crammed with too many action events and has a drab script. The dialogue is cliched, the characterization as thin as gruel, the plot devices overfamiliar, and the action sequences fail to generate any excitement. Jason Patric fails to fully impose himself as the lead and Sandra Bullock is disappointingly sidelined into producing a frenetic character and she ends up overworking her character. Willem Dafoe looks the part but acts tough rather than playing tough. All in all, it's action packed but froths over. The finale does justify sticking with it because back in 1997 it was most expensive stunt ever filmed.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76249,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.9,"duration":"PT2H1M"</script><metacontent="

Union Army, and the Confederates.","keywords":"19th century,american civil war,black soldier,military uniform,soldier","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jveitch"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Broderick excellent as Shaw","reviewBody":"There seem to be a great many comments listed arguing whether

Mathew Broderick was a good choice to play Col. Robert Shaw or

not. All I can say is that he makes the film work for me. Whether

Broderick under played the part or not, I couldn't imagine any other

actor being more appropriate for the part. Not only were his looks

and age ideal for the individual he was recreating, but his

performance gave Gould the personality he needed; as someone

who was idealistic, young and somewhat callow, yet ultimately

displayed great maturity and fantastic courage. 

While Denzel Washington's performance was far more forceful

(and aptly so), I honestly found Broderick's character the most

compelling in the movie.

By the climactic battle, I felt great empathy for each of the

characters, especially Col. Shaw. I guess I feel that by playing

Shaw as a quiet rather than grand presence, Broderick is able to

more successfully highlight the extraordinary bravery and moral

fibre the man showed in his willingness to sacrifice everything for

his men and their cause. Though you could clearly see that he

dreaded his duty, he carried it out unflinchingly. Thats what

leadership is all about. I like heroes who show their humanity

infinitely more than those hollywoodised cutouts that actors like

Bruce Willis often play. I've never actually seen Ferris Bueller's day out. A lot of people who

write about Glory say that its hard not to see that character

wherever Broderick goes. I'll be interested to see Ferris Bueller

now that I've established Broderick in my mind as a Civil war

officer. I'll be happy to here anyones comments on the subject."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":126085,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Rat za slavu
programme.desc: Robert Gould Shaw (M. Broderick), sin bogatog bostonskog abolicionista, imao je dvadeset tri godine kada se prijavio u sjevernjačku vojsku kako bi se borio u Američkom građanskom ratu. Robert Gould Shaw u američkom Građanskom ratu vodi prvi dobrovoljački odred koji je sastavljen isključivo od crnaca te se pritom bori protiv predrasuda svoje vlastite, sjevernjačke vojske i vojske Konfederacije.

sequel lacking the original's thematic strength","reviewBody":"An American action adventure thriller and sequel to the 1994 hit "Speed". Sadly, this follow up set on a slow moving cruise ship lacked the impetus of the original's theme-as-action. It has some very impressive stunts and it never fails to look busy, but the story is crammed with too many action events and has a drab script. The dialogue is cliched, the characterization as thin as gruel, the plot devices overfamiliar, and the action sequences fail to generate any excitement. Jason Patric fails to fully impose himself as the lead and Sandra Bullock is disappointingly sidelined into producing a frenetic character and she ends up overworking her character. Willem Dafoe looks the part but acts tough rather than playing tough. All in all, it's action packed but froths over. The finale does justify sticking with it because back in 1997 it was most expensive stunt ever filmed.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76249,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.9},"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Crveni mesec
programme.desc: Ljubavna, ali i snažna istorijska priča koja se tiče svih nas, smeštena je u period od avgusta 1913, nakon pobede Srbije u Balkanskim ratovima kada je povratila deo teoritorije, do kraja 1915. godine,... Ljubavna, ali i snažna istorijska priča koja se tiče svih nas, smeštena je u period od avgusta 1913, nakon pobede Srbije u Balkanskim ratovima kada je povratila deo teoritorije, do kraja 1915. godine, kada je austrougarska vojska okupirala Beograd. Glavni junak, mladi srpski oficir, vraća se sa ratišta u rodnu kuću. Svadba mu je, tradicionalno, već zakazana, ali zaplet priče počinje kada ćerka austrougarskog poslanika, koju igra Ivana Dudić, "baci oko" na njega. Nedopustivo za to vreme, koketna mlada dama, ne krije svoja osećanja. Rasplet njihove ljubavne drame (koja je plod mašte autora) odvija se u realnom istorijskom periodu pred Veliki rat, pa se u scenariju pojavljuje još dvadesetak glavnih likova, uglavnom stvarnih istorijskih ličnosti. Biće tu dramatičnih događanja, špijunskih intriga, diplomatskih nadmudrivanja, političkih spletki i prevara...

secret","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0105698/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fmarkland32"},"dateCreated":"2006-05-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Universally watchable","reviewBody":"Two dead American soldiers from Vietnam resurface years later as nuclear machines that help take down terrorists. However when a nosy reporter starts snooping around she rekindles the memories of the soldiers, one wants to go home and the other wants to kill the other. Jean-Claude Van Damme and Dolph Lundgren together in one film doesn't exactly bring up expectations of quality. However Universal Soldier manages to be far more entertaining than one would've guessed and not even in guilty pleasure way. The action is rather spectacular and while Van Damme and Lundgren are rather well suited to their parts. The secondary characters such as Jerry Orbach,Ed O'Ross and Ally Walker only provide our hero and villain with targets to shoot at but for mindless enjoyment, you can certainly do worse.\n\n* *1/2 out 4-(Pretty good)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":84286,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

Zack Ward, Monica May, Kevin Thompson, John Duerler, Stephen Settgast, Meg Cionni, Kimberly Arland, Erik Betts

programme.title: Zvjezdane staze: U tami
programme.desc: Kada nemilosrdni zločinac zvan Khan objavi rat Federaciji, kapetan Kirk, Spock i smiona posada "U. S. S. Enterprisea" kreću u najveću potjeru za kriminalcem u povijesti. Kada posadu "Enterprisea" pozovu kući, otkriju da je nezaustavljivi terorist unutar njihove organizacije detonirao flotu i sve što ona predstavlja ostavivši svijet u kriznome stanju. S osobnom osvetom na umu, kapetan Kirk predvodi potjeru za kriminalcem u ratnu zonu kako bi ulovio oružje masovnog uništenja utjelovljeno u jednome čovjeku. Dok naši junaci igraju epsku partiju šaha na život i smrt, ljubav će biti ugrožena, prijateljstva prekinuta, a Kirk će se morati žrtvovati za jedinu obitelj koja mu je preostala: svoju posadu.

credits.actor: Michael Copon, Karen Shenaz David, Simon Quarterman, Tom Wu, Randy Couture, Andreas Wisniewski, Natalie Becker, Jeremy Crutchley
Zack Ward, Monica May, Kevin Thompson, John Duerler, Stephen Settgast, Meg Cionni, Kimberly Arland, Erik Betts

secret","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0105698/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"fmarkland32","dateCreated":"2006-05-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Universally watchable","reviewBody":"Two dead American soldiers from Vietnam resurface years later as nuclear machines that help take down terrorists. However when a nosy reporter starts snooping around she rekindles the memories of the soldiers, one wants to go home and the other wants to kill the other. Jean-Claude Van Damme and Dolph Lundgren together in one film doesn't exactly bring up expectations of quality. However Universal Soldier manages to be far more entertaining than one would've guessed and not even in guilty pleasure way. The action is rather spectacular and while Van Damme and Lundgren are rather well suited to their parts. The secondary characters such as Jerry Orbach,Ed O'Ross and Ally Walker only provide our hero and villain with targets to shoot at but for mindless enjoyment, you can certainly do worse.\n\n* *1/2 out 4-(Pretty good)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":84286,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"duration":"PT1H42M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fantastična četvorka
programme.desc: Fantastična četvorka suvremena je verzija Marvelova izvornog i najdugovječnijeg tima superheroja, a prati četvero mladih autsajdera koje teleportiraju u alternativan i opasan svemir. Promijeniš li svijet, budi ga spreman braniti. Prijatelji Reed Richard (Miles Teller) i Ben Grimm (Jamie Bell) još od djetinjstva rade na svom prototipu teleportera, čime privuku pozornost profesora Franklina Storma (Reg E. Cathey), ravnatelja Baxter foundacije, instituta sponzoriranog od strane vlade, koji okuplja mlade genijalce. Reed je pozvan da im se pridruži te pomogne znanstvenici Sue Storm (Kate Mare) i Johnnyju Stormu (Michael B. Jordan) kako bi završili "kvantna vrata", koji je dizajnirao Stormov stićenik Victor von Doom (Toby Kebbell). Eksperiment je uspješan, a voditelj projekta, doktor Allen (Tim Blake Nelson) sada planira poslati grupu iz NASA-e u paralelnu dimenziju. Razočarani što se ne mogu pridružiti ekspediciji, Reed, Johnny, Victor i Ben planiraju neovlašteno iskoristiti kvantna vrata kako bi sami otišli u paralelnu dimenziju, nazvanu "Planet zero".

credits.actor: Dylan O'Brien, Will Poulter, Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Kaya Scodelario, Patricia Clarkson, Jacob Latimore, Aml Ameen, Ki Hong Lee

programme.title: Ultraviolet
Ultraviolet
programme.desc:
Ultraviolet: Directed by Kurt Wimmer. With Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright, Nick Chinlund, Sebastien Andrieu. A beautiful hæmophage infected with a virus that gives her superhuman powers has to protect a boy in a futuristic world, who is thought to be carrying antigens that would destroy all hæmophages." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0370032/","name":"Ultraviolet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWY4ZjQyOWQtYWZiNS00MTcyLWIzZTEtNDQxOWMxNTkwMmU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000170/","name":"Milla Jovovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1080974/","name":"Cameron Bright"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0157915/","name":"Nick Chinlund"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0123058/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ultraviolet (2005)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2363490585","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzlhMDJmYzMtYjcyNi00NTNhLTllY2MtNWU3MGE0ZGFlMWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzlhMDJmYzMtYjcyNi00NTNhLTllY2MtNWU3MGE0ZGFlMWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Screen Gems"},"datePublished":"2006-05-03","description":"A beautiful hæmophage infected with a virus that gives her superhuman powers has to protect a boy in a futuristic world, who is thought to be carrying antigens that would destroy all hæmophages.","keywords":"terrible dialogue,bad acting,bare midriff,bare shoulders,boy","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0370032/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"machintim"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Errrrr.... What?","reviewBody":"It is a little difficult to imagine why this film was released in its current form. It has some potential, the action sequences look a little mundane as we have seen it all before but they are quick and effective. The story is quirky enough to be interesting and some of the backdrops look good.

The problem is, Ultraviolet neither makes sense nor holds together as a film. Huge chunks of action and story seem to have been lost on the cutting room floor. The film is left overloaded with the expensive bits that had already been paid for. Lots of sweeping city-scapes and shots of Mila walking down corridors don't make a film.

It reminds me of other Japanese live action Manga smash-ups (See Kasshern etc). The problem is that Japanese films have every right not to make sense and be completely over the top, as it is what they do best. Unfortunately, due to a westernised need for slight reality, Hollywood have attempted same thing and ended up with a cheap looking film with a poor script stuck together with a bunch of crap one liners.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80083,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.4},"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

abroad","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0080736/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Idocamstuf"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"I really enjoyed it","reviewBody":"This was a highly entertaining sleeper about a naval ship that happens to go through a time warp and end up at Pearl Harbor just hours before the attack in 1941. Realistic acting, special effects and air scenes really make this movie stand out from other similar movies. I'm really surprised that this film is not more popular, because this was a very unique and fascinating concept for a movie, especially back in 1980. I would recommend this movie to anyone who enjoys a good science-fiction film. I'm also surprised that it has such a low rating, I was expecting it to be rated at least a 7. Ill give it an 8 out of 10. Well worth viewing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":22077,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Konačno odbrojavanje
programme.desc: Moderni nuklearni nosač aviona i njegova posada se nalaze u nezgodnoj situaciji, kada ih strašna oluja nekim čudom vrati u 1941. godinu, jedan sat prije napada Japanaca na Perl Harbur. Uoči posljednje godine dvadesetog stoljeća, nervozni vojni zapovjednik okuplja tim koji mu pomaže u rješavanju nepredviđenih problema, budući da su upozoreni na dugo nestalo nuklearne rakete skrivene negdje duboko u džungli, . Na njima je da se utrkuju s vremenom da ga zaustave prije nego što bude prekasno.

programme.title: Ultraviolet
Ultraviolet
programme.desc:
Ultraviolet: Directed by Kurt Wimmer. With Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright, Nick Chinlund, Sebastien Andrieu. A beautiful hæmophage infected with a virus that gives her superhuman powers has to protect a boy in a futuristic world, who is thought to be carrying antigens that would destroy all hæmophages." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0370032/","name":"Ultraviolet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWY4ZjQyOWQtYWZiNS00MTcyLWIzZTEtNDQxOWMxNTkwMmU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000170/","name":"Milla Jovovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1080974/","name":"Cameron Bright"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0157915/","name":"Nick Chinlund"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0123058/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ultraviolet (2005)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2363490585","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzlhMDJmYzMtYjcyNi00NTNhLTllY2MtNWU3MGE0ZGFlMWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzlhMDJmYzMtYjcyNi00NTNhLTllY2MtNWU3MGE0ZGFlMWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Screen Gems"},"datePublished":"2006-05-03","description":"A beautiful hæmophage infected with a virus that gives her superhuman powers has to protect a boy in a futuristic world, who is thought to be carrying antigens that would destroy all hæmophages.","keywords":"terrible dialogue,bad acting,bare midriff,bare shoulders,boy","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0370032/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"machintim"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Errrrr.... What?","reviewBody":"It is a little difficult to imagine why this film was released in its current form. It has some potential, the action sequences look a little mundane as we have seen it all before but they are quick and effective. The story is quirky enough to be interesting and some of the backdrops look good.

The problem is, Ultraviolet neither makes sense nor holds together as a film. Huge chunks of action and story seem to have been lost on the cutting room floor. The film is left overloaded with the expensive bits that had already been paid for. Lots of sweeping city-scapes and shots of Mila walking down corridors don't make a film.

It reminds me of other Japanese live action Manga smash-ups (See Kasshern etc). The problem is that Japanese films have every right not to make sense and be completely over the top, as it is what they do best. Unfortunately, due to a westernised need for slight reality, Hollywood have attempted same thing and ended up with a cheap looking film with a poor script stuck together with a bunch of crap one liners.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80083,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.4},"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

On se upućuje tamo kako bi proveo s... Radnja prati veoma popularnog američkog pisca koji nakon tragedije u kojoj mu poludeli fan ubije ženu i dete, dobija poziv iz Barselone da mu je otac na samrti. On se upućuje tamo kako bi proveo s njim poslednje dane uz priliku da popravi odnose sa otuđenim bratom. Tamo će shvatiti da mu je život, kao i život njegovih bližnjih označen brojem 11 i da je 11.11.11. više od datuma - to je upozorenje.
